self_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry believes he will win against Ermes, citing his experience against top rollers and his training focus. He predicts a tough match but expects to come out victorious.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Strong, but Jerry believes he can overpower him
Ermes Gasparini.health: Ermes claims to be at 85% now but will be 100% for the match
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has been performing well but Jerry thinks his style is predictable

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry thinks Prudnik will win against Michael Todd, especially if Michael is at 250 lbs. He believes Prudnik's quickness and strength will be too much for Michael.
third_party_predictions.predicted_duration: Could be quick if Prudnik dominates

Michael Todd.strength: Strong defensively but may struggle at lower weight
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael has had recent losses and barely beat Todd Hutchings

Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Prudnik has been impressive in recent matches

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry believes Morozov will win by bringing Revaz down to a hook and overpowering him.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov has been training non-stop and is in great shape

Revaz Lutidze.strength: Strong but returning after a long break
Revaz Lutidze.previous_match_summary: Revaz is taking arm wrestling seriously for the first time in years

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin mentions the match but does not provide a clear prediction. He seems to respect both athletes.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon is preparing for future matches
